room.name: Spaceport
room.description: A bustling spaceport with ships coming and going. You notice a faint hum of engines from the Launchpad to the north.

room.name: Launchpad
room.description: A massive launchpad with towering spaceships. The air is filled with the scent of rocket fuel.

room.name: Galactic Lounge
room.description: A stylish lounge with holographic displays. You catch a glimpse of a floating menu from the Bar to the south.

room.name: Bar
room.description: A lively bar with alien patrons. The bartender gestures towards a glowing concoction labeled 'Starlight Elixir'.

room.name: Research Lab
room.description: A high-tech research lab with advanced equipment. You sense a peculiar energy from the Teleportation Chamber to the west.

room.name: Teleportation Chamber
room.description: A chamber with swirling energy patterns. A console hints at destinations in distant galaxies.

room.name: Stellar Garden
room.description: A serene garden with floating asteroids and rare celestial flowers. You feel a mysterious presence.

room.name: Nebula Nexus
room.description: A mesmerizing nexus surrounded by colorful nebulas. You hear whispers of cosmic secrets.

room.name: Interstellar Bridge
room.description: A bridge connecting star systems. The view of distant galaxies is breathtaking.

room.name: Void Observatory
room.description: An observatory at the edge of the universe. The darkness is both beautiful and unsettling.

item.name: Photon Blade
item.description: A blade that harnesses the power of photons.

item.name: Quantum Elixir
item.description: A potion that bends the laws of space and time to restore health.

item.name: Star Chart
item.description: A holographic star chart with unknown constellations.

item.name: Celestial stone
item.description: It's a pointy rock to bludgeon your enemies with.
